title: TOI
content:
A classified document leaked to Israel’s Channel 11 has exposed Donald Trump’s so-called “Comprehensive End of Gaza War” plan. The framework reportedly outlines Israel’s full military withdrawal within 24 hours, an immediate 72-hour ceasefire, and the release of all hostages held in Gaza. Trump is said to have coordinated the deal with Israel, Hamas, Qatar, and Egypt, while U.S. troops have already been deployed near Gaza for monitoring. Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu confirmed the breakthrough, thanking Trump, Jared Kushner, and Steve Witkoff for their mediation efforts, calling the development “a victory for diplomacy and courage.”

Indian cricket stars relax and unwind at Head Coach Gautam Gambhir’s residence, as a massive crowd gathers to warmly greet the Men in Blue.
